Astromech.name: BB-8
Astromech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform a %BARRELROLL% or %BOOST% action.

Astromech.name: BB Astromech
Astromech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform a %BARRELROLL% action.

Astromech.name: M9-G8
Astromech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%While a ship you are locking performs an attack, you may choose 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker rerolls that die.

Astromech.name: R5-X3
Astromech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%Before you activate or engage, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to ignore obstacles until the end of this phase.

Astromech.name: R2-HA
Astromech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%While you defend, you may spend your lock on the attacker to reroll any number of your defense dice.

Astromech.name: R2 Astromech
Astromech.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

Astromech.name: R3 Astromech
Astromech.ability: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.%LINEBREAK%After you perform a %LOCK% action, you may acquire a lock.

Astromech.name: R4 Astromech
Astromech.ability: small ship only%LINEBREAK%Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1-2 basic maneuvers (%TURNLEFT%, %BANKLEFT%, %STRAIGHT%, %BANKRIGHT%, %TURNRIGHT%).

Astromech.name: R5 Astromech
Astromech.ability: Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE% to repair 1 facedown damage card.%LINEBREAK%Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

Astromech.name: "Genius"
Astromech.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you fully execute a maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 bomb.

Astromech.name: R5-TK
Astromech.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%You can perform attacks against friendly ships.

Astromech.name: R5-P8
Astromech.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack against a defender in your %FRONTARC%, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a %CRIT% result, suffer 1 %CRIT% damage.

Astromech.name: "Chopper"
Astromech.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 non-recurring  %CHARGE% from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. %LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring %CHARGE% on an equipped upgrade.

Astromech.name: R2-D2
Astromech.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

Astromech.name: R5-D8
Astromech.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE% to repair 1 facedown damage card.%LINEBREAK%Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

Cannon.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
Cannon.ability: Attack: After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all %CRIT% results to %HIT% results.

Cannon.name: Ion Cannon
Cannon.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

Cannon.name: Jamming Beam
Cannon.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

Cannon.name: Tractor Beam
Cannon.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

Configuration.name: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
Configuration.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform %TORPEDO% and %MISSILE% attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during the attack.%LINEBREAK%Add %TORPEDO% and %MISSILE% slots.

Configuration.name: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
Configuration.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform %CANNON% attacks. While you perform a %CANNON% attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice.%LINEBREAK%Add %CANNON% slot.

Configuration.name: Pivot Wing
Configuration.ability: Closed: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die.%LINEBREAK%After you execute a [0 %STOP%] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90º or 180º.%LINEBREAK%Before you activate, you may flip this card.%LINEBREAK%Open: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

Configuration.name: Servomotor S-Foils
Configuration.ability: Closed: Adds %BOOST% , %FOCUS%  %BOOST%%LINEBREAK% While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die.%LINEBREAK%Before you activate, you may flip this card.%LINEBREAK%Open: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

Configuration.name: Integrated S-Foils
Configuration.ability: Closed: Adds %BARRELROLL%, %FOCUS%   %BARRELROLL%%LINEBREAK% While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is not in your %BULLSEYEARC%, roll 1 fewer attack die. %LINEBREAK% Before you activate, you may flip this card. %LINEBREAK% Open: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

Crew.name: 4-LOM
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

Crew.name: Boba Fett
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%Setup: Start in reserve.%LINEBREAK%At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

Crew.name: Cad Bane
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red %BOOST% action.

Crew.name: Chewbacca
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

Crew.name: Cikatro Vizago
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%During the End Phase, you may choose 2 %ILLICIT% upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0-1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades.%LINEBREAK%End of Game: Return all %ILLICIT% upgrades to their original ships.

Crew.name: IG-88D
Crew.ability: Adds %CALCULATE%%LINEBREAK%Scum only%LINEBREAK%You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade.%LINEBREAK%After you perform a %CALCULATE% action, gain 1 calculate token.

Crew.name: Ketsu Onyo
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-2 in your firing arc. If you do, that ship does not remove its tractor tokens.

Crew.name: L3-37
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%Setup: Equip this side faceup.%LINEBREAK%While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attacker must reroll all attack dice.%LINEBREAK%L3-37’s ProgrammingIf you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank (%BANKLEFT% and %BANKRIGHT%) maneuvers.

Crew.name: Lando Calrissian
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

Crew.name: Latts Razzi
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/%FOCUS% results to an %EVADE% result.

Crew.name: Maul
Crew.ability: Scum or Squad including Ezra Bridger or Squad including Ezra Bridger (Sheathipede) or Squad including Ezra Bridger (TIE Fighter) only%LINEBREAK%After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1 %FORCE%.%LINEBREAK%You can equip "Dark Side" upgrades.

Crew.name: Qi’ra
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you move and perform attacks, you ignore obstacles that you are locking.

Crew.name: Tobias Beckett
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%Setup: After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

Crew.name: Unkar Plutt
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you partially execute a maneuver, you may suffer 1 %HIT% damage to perform 1 white action.

Crew.name: Zuckuss
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, if you are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

Crew.name: Jabba the Hutt
Crew.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2 and spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, that ship recovers 1 %CHARGE% on 1 of its equipped %ILLICIT% upgrades.

Crew.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.

Crew.name: "Chopper"
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 %HIT% damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

Crew.name: Baze Malbus
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a %FOCUS% action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0-1, to a maximum of 2.

Crew.name: Cassian Andor
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship’s dial. If the chosen ship’s bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

Crew.name: Hera Syndulla
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1 %HIT% damage.

Crew.name: Jyn Erso
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

Crew.name: Kanan Jarrus
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%After a friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

Crew.name: Sabine Wren
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%Setup: Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card. %LINEBREAK%After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

Crew.name: C-3PO
Crew.ability: Adds %CALCULATE%%LINEBREAK%Rebel only%LINEBREAK%Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many %EVADE% results, add 1 %EVADE% result.%LINEBREAK%After you perform the %CALCULATE% action, gain 1 calculate token.

Crew.name: Chewbacca
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 %CHARGE% to repair 1 faceup damage card.

Crew.name: Lando Calrissian
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each %FOCUS% result, gain 1 focus token. For each %EVADE% result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

Crew.name: Leia Organa
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 %CHARGE%. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

Crew.name: Magva Yarro
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%After you defend, if the attack hit, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

Crew.name: Nien Nunb
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers (%BANKLEFT% and %BANKRIGHT%).

Crew.name: R2-D2
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a %HIT% result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

Crew.name: Saw Gerrera
Crew.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1 %HIT% damage to change all of your %FOCUS% results to %CRIT% results.

Crew.name: ISB Slicer
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1-2 cannot remove jam tokens.

Crew.name: Director Krennic
Crew.ability: Adds %LOCK%%LINEBREAK%Empire only%LINEBREAK%Setup: Before placing forces, assign the Optimized Prototype condition to another friendly ship.

Crew.name: Death Troopers
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%During the Activation Phase, enemy ships at range 0-1 cannot remove stress tokens.

Crew.name: Grand Inquisitor
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%After an enemy ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

Crew.name: Darth Vader
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0-2 and spend 1 %FORCE%. If you do, that ship suffers 1 %HIT% damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

Crew.name: Seventh Sister
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%If an enemy ship at range 0-1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

Crew.name: Emperor Palpatine
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%While another friendly ship defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to modify 1 of its dice as though that ship had spent 1 %FORCE%.

Scum or Squad including Darth Vader only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

Crew.name: Admiral Sloane
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%After another friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens.%LINEBREAK%While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

Crew.name: Agent Kallus
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%Setup: Assign the Hunted condition to 1 enemy ship.%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack against the ship with the Hunted condition, you may change 1 of your %FOCUS% results to a %HIT% result.

Crew.name: Ciena Ree
Crew.ability: Requires %COORDINATE% or %COORDINATE%%LINEBREAK%Empire only%LINEBREAK%After you perform a %COORDINATE% action, if the ship you coordinated performed a %BARRELROLL% or %BOOST% action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90°.

Crew.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
Crew.ability: Requires %LOCK% or %LOCK%%LINEBREAK%Empire only%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 2 %CHARGE%. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

Crew.name: Minister Tua
Crew.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red %REINFORCE% action.

Crew.name: Moff Jerjerrod
Crew.ability: Requires %COORDINATE% or %COORDINATE% Empire only%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 2 %CHARGE%. If you do, choose the [1 %BANKLEFT%], [1 %STRAIGHT%], or [1 %BANKRIGHT%] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red %BOOST% action using that template.

Crew.name: Freelance Slicer
Crew.ability: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a %HIT% or %CRIT% result, gain 1 jam token.

Crew.name: GNK "Gonk" Droid
Crew.ability: Setup: Lose 1 %CHARGE%.%LINEBREAK%Action: Recover 1 %CHARGE%.%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE% to recover 1 shield.

Crew.name: Novice Technician
Crew.ability: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a %HIT% result, expose 1 damage card.

Crew.name: Informant
Crew.ability: During the System Phase, if an enemy ship with the Informant upgrade is at range 0-2, flip your dial faceup.

Crew.name: Perceptive Copilot
Crew.ability: After you perform a %FOCUS% action, gain 1 focus token.

Crew.name: Seasoned Navigator
Crew.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

Crew.name: Tactical Officer
Crew.ability: Adds %COORDINATE%%LINEBREAK%Requires %COORDINATE%

Crew.name: Captain Phasma
Crew.ability: First Order only%LINEBREAK%At the end of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0-1 that is not stressed gains 1 stress token.

Crew.name: Supreme Leader Snoke
Crew.ability: First Order only%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may choose any number of enemy ships beyond range 1. If you do, spend that many %FORCE% to flip each chosen ship’s dial faceup.

Crew.name: General Hux
Crew.ability: Requires %COORDINATE% or %COORDINATE%. First Order only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a white %COORDINATE% action, you may treat it as red. If you do, you may coordinate up to 2 additional ships of the same ship type, and each ship you coordinate must perform the same action, treating that action as red.

Crew.name: Kylo Ren
Crew.ability: First Order only%LINEBREAK%Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-3. If you do, spend 1 %FORCE% to assign the I’ll Show You the Dark Side condition to that ship.

Crew.name: Petty Officer Thanisson
Crew.ability: First Order only%LINEBREAK%During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after an enemy ship in your %FRONTARC% at range 0-1 gains a red or orange token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional token of the type that it gained.

Crew.name: C-3PO
Crew.ability: Adds %CALCULATE% , %COORDINATE%%LINEBREAK%Resistance only%LINEBREAK%While you coordinate, you can choose friendly ships beyond range 2 if they have %CALCULATE% on their action bar.%LINEBREAK%After you perform the %CALCULATE% or %COORDINATE% action, gain 1 calculate token.

Crew.name: Chewbacca
Crew.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%Setup: Lose 1 %CHARGE%.%LINEBREAK%After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is dealt 1 damage card, recover 1 %CHARGE%.%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may spend 2 %CHARGE% to change 1 %FOCUS% result to a %CRIT% result.

Crew.name: Han Solo
Crew.ability: Adds %EVADE%%LINEBREAK%Resistance only%LINEBREAK%After you perform an %EVADE% action, gain additional evade tokens equal to the number of enemy ships at range 0-1.

Crew.name: Rose Tico
Crew.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 of your results to acquire a lock on the enemy ship.

Device.name: Bomblet Generator
Device.ability: Bomb%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Bomblet with the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 %CHARGE%.

Device.name: Conner Nets
Device.ability: Mine%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Conner Net using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.%LINEBREAK%This card’s %CHARGE% cannot be recovered.

Device.name: Proton Bombs
Device.ability: Bomb%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.

Device.name: Proximity Mines
Device.ability: Mine%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.%LINEBREAK%This card’s %CHARGE% cannot be recovered.

Device.name: Seismic Charges
Device.ability: Bomb%LINEBREAK%During the System Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.

Forcecharge.name: Heightened Perception
Forcecharge.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 %FORCE%. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

Forcecharge.name: Instinctive Aim
Forcecharge.ability: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to ignore the %FOCUS% or %LOCK% requirement.

Forcecharge.name: Sense
Forcecharge.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1 %FORCE%, you may choose a ship at range 0-3 instead.

Forcecharge.name: Supernatural Reflexes
Forcecharge.ability: Small ship only.%LINEBREAK%Before you activate, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to perform a %BARRELROLL% or %BOOST% action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1 %HIT% damage.

Forcecharge.name: Predictive Shot
Forcecharge.ability: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may spend 1 %FORCE%. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your %HIT%/%CRIT% results.

Forcecharge.name: Hate
Forcecharge.ability: Darkside users. After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many %FORCE%.

Gunner.name: Agile Gunner
Gunner.ability: During the End Phase, you may rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC% indicator.

Gunner.name: Hotshot Gunner
Gunner.ability: While you perform a %SINGLETURRETARC% attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

Gunner.name: Skilled Bombardier
Gunner.ability: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

Gunner.name: Veteran Tail Gunner
Gunner.ability: After you perform a primary %FRONTARC% attack, you may perform a bonus primary %REARARC% attack.

Gunner.name: Veteran Turret Gunner
Gunner.ability: Requires %ROTATEARC% or %ROTATEARC%%LINEBREAK%After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus %SINGLETURRETARC% attack using a %SINGLETURRETARC% you did not already attack from this round.

Gunner.name: Special Forces Gunner
Gunner.ability: First Order only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a primary %FRONTARC% attack, if your %SINGLETURRETARC% is in your %FRONTARC%, you may roll 1 additional attack die.%LINEBREAK%After you perform a primary %FRONTARC% attack, if your %SINGLETURRETARC% is in your %REARARC%, you may perform a bonus primary %SINGLETURRETARC% attack.

Gunner.name: Finn
Gunner.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy ship is in your %FRONTARC%, you may add 1 blank result to your roll (this die can be rerolled or otherwise modified).

Gunner.name: Paige Tico
Gunner.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%After you perform a primary attack, you may drop 1 bomb or rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC%.%LINEBREAK%After you are destroyed, you may drop 1 bomb.

Gunner.name: Rey
Gunner.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is in your %SINGLETURRETARC%, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to change 1 of your blank results to a %EVADE% or %HIT% result.

Gunner.name: Han Solo
Gunner.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%Before you engage, you may perform a red %FOCUS% action.

Gunner.name: Greedo
Gunner.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.%LINEBREAK%While you defend, if your %CHARGE% is active, the attacker may change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Gunner.name: Dengar
Gunner.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a %HIT% or %CRIT% result, the attacker suffers 1 %HIT% damage.

Gunner.name: BT-1
Gunner.ability: Scum or Squad including Darth Vader only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result for each stress token the defender has.

Gunner.name: Fifth Brother
Gunner.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to change 1 of your %FOCUS% results to a %CRIT% result.

Gunner.name: Luke Skywalker
Gunner.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC% indicator.

Gunner.name: Han Solo
Gunner.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a %SINGLETURRETARC% attack. You cannot attack from that %SINGLETURRETARC% again this round.

Gunner.name: Ezra Bridger
Gunner.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%After you perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to perform a bonus %SINGLETURRETARC% attack from a %SINGLETURRETARC% you have not attacked from this round. If you do and you are stressed, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Gunner.name: Bistan
Gunner.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a bonus %SINGLETURRETARC% attack against a ship you have not already attacked this round.

Illicit.name: Cloaking Device
Illicit.ability: small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform a %CLOAK% action.%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a %FOCUS% result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

Illicit.name: Contraband Cybernetics
Illicit.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

Illicit.name: Feedback Array
Illicit.ability: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1 %HIT% damage.

Illicit.name: Deadman's Switch
Illicit.ability: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 %HIT% damage.

Illicit.name: Inertial Dampeners
Illicit.ability: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0 %STOP%] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

Illicit.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
Illicit.ability: large ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%Action: Spend 1 %CHARGE%. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1 %STRAIGHT%] template.

Missile.name: Cluster Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0-1 of the defender, ignoring the %LOCK% requirement.

Missile.name: Concussion Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0-1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

Missile.name: Homing Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

Missile.name: Ion Missiles
Missile.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

Missile.name: Barrage Rockets
Missile.ability: Attack (%FOCUS%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. If the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may spend 1 or more %CHARGE% to reroll that many attack dice.

Modification.name: Ablative Plating
Modification.ability: large ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

Modification.name: Advanced SLAM
Modification.ability: Requires %SLAM%%LINEBREAK%After you perform a %SLAM% action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

Modification.name: Afterburners
Modification.ability: small ship only%LINEBREAK%After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform a %BOOST% action, even while stressed.

Modification.name: Electronic Baffle
Modification.ability: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1 %HIT% damage to remove 1 red token.

Modification.name: Munitions Failsafe
Modification.ability: While you perform a %TORPEDO% or %MISSILE% attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 %CHARGE% you spent as a cost for the attack.

Modification.name: Static Discharge Vanes
Modification.ability: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead.

Modification.name: Tactical Scrambler
Modification.ability: large ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

Modification.name: Stealth Device
Modification.ability: While you defend, if your %CHARGE% is active, roll 1 additional defense die.%LINEBREAK%After you suffer damage, lose 1 %CHARGE%.

Sensor.name: Advanced Sensors
Sensor.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.%LINEBREAK%If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

Sensor.name: Collision Detector
Sensor.ability: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.%LINEBREAK%After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

Sensor.name: Fire-Control System
Sensor.ability: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

Sensor.name: Trajectory Simulator
Sensor.ability: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5 %STRAIGHT%] template instead.

Talent.name: Composure
Talent.ability: Requires %FOCUS% or %FOCUS%%LINEBREAK%After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a %FOCUS% action.

Talent.name: Crack Shot
Talent.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to cancel 1 %EVADE% result.

Talent.name: Daredevil
Talent.ability: Requires %BOOST%%LINEBREAK%small ship only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a white %BOOST% action, you may treat it as red to use the [1 %TURNLEFT%] or [1 %TURNRIGHT%] template instead.

Talent.name: Debris Gambit
Talent.ability: Adds %EVADE%%LINEBREAK%small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a red %EVADE% action, if there is an obstacle at range 0-1, treat the action as white instead.

Talent.name: Elusive
Talent.ability: small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you defend, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to reroll 1 defense die.%LINEBREAK%After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 %CHARGE%.

Talent.name: Expert Handling
Talent.ability: Requires %BARRELROLL%%LINEBREAK%Adds %BARRELROLL%

Talent.name: Fearless
Talent.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a %FRONTARC% primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender’s %FRONTARC%, you may change 1 of your results to a %HIT% result.

Talent.name: Intimidation
Talent.ability: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

Talent.name: Juke
Talent.ability: small ship or medium ship only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s %EVADE% results to a %FOCUS% result.

Talent.name: Lone Wolf
Talent.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to reroll 1 of your dice.

Talent.name: Marksmanship
Talent.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Talent.name: Outmaneuver
Talent.ability: While you perform a %FRONTARC% attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

Talent.name: Predator
Talent.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your %BULLSEYEARC%, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Talent.name: Ruthless
Talent.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1 %HIT% damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a %HIT% result.

Talent.name: Saturation Salvo
Talent.ability: Requires %RELOAD% or %RELOAD%%LINEBREAK%While you perform a %TORPEDO% or %MISSILE% attack, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

Talent.name: Selfless
Talent.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 %CRIT% damage to cancel 1 %CRIT% result.

Talent.name: Squad Leader
Talent.ability: Adds %COORDINATE%%LINEBREAK%While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

Talent.name: Swarm Tactics
Talent.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

Talent.name: Trick Shot
Talent.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

Talent.name: Heroic
Talent.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

Talent.name: Fanatical
Talent.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 %FOCUS% result to a %HIT% result.

Tech.name: Advanced Optics
Tech.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a %HIT% result.

Tech.name: Pattern Analyzer
Tech.ability: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

Tech.name: Targeting Synchronizer
Tech.ability: Requires %LOCK% or %LOCK%%LINEBREAK%While a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the %LOCK% attack requirement.

Tech.name: Primed Thrusters
Tech.ability: small ship only%LINEBREAK%While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform %BARRELROLL% and %BOOST% actions even while stressed.

Tech.name: Ferrosphere Paint
Tech.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%After an enemy ship locks you, if you are not in that ship’s %BULLSEYEARC%, that ship gains 1 stress token.

Tech.name: Hyperspace Tracking Data
Tech.ability: Large ship only. First Order only.%LINEBREAK%Setup: Before placing forces, you may choose a number between 0 and 6. Treat your initiative as the chosen value during Setup.%LINEBREAK%After Setup, assign 1 focus or evade token to each friendly ship at range 0-2.

Tech.name: Biohexacrypt Codes
Tech.ability: While you coordinate or jam, if you have a lock on a ship, you may spend that lock to choose that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

Title.name: Rey’s Millennium Falcon
Title.ability: Resistance only%LINEBREAK%If you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can execute red Segnor’s Loop [%SLOOPLEFT% or %SLOOPRIGHT%] maneuvers and perform %BOOST% and  actions even while stressed.

Title.name: Black One
Title.ability: Adds %SLAM%%LINEBREAK%Resistance only%LINEBREAK%After you perform a %SLAM% action, lose 1 %CHARGE%. Then you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token.%LINEBREAK%If your %CHARGE% is inactive, you cannot perform the %SLAM% action.

Title.name: ST-321
Title.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%After you perform a %COORDINATE% action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 0-3 of the ship you coordinated. If you do, acquire a lock on that enemy ship, ignoring range restrictions.

Title.name: Dauntless
Title.ability: Empire only%LINEBREAK%After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.

Title.name: Phantom
Title.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%You can dock at range 0-1.

Title.name: Millennium Falcon
Title.ability: Adds %EVADE%%LINEBREAK%Rebel only%LINEBREAK%While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

Title.name: Moldy Crow
Title.ability: Rebel or Scum only%LINEBREAK%Gain a %FRONTARC% primary weapon with a value of "3".%LINEBREAK%During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.

Title.name: Ghost
Title.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK%You can dock 1 attack shuttle or Sheathipede-class shuttle.%LINEBREAK%Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

Title.name: Outrider
Title.ability: Rebel only%LINEBREAK% While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die. %LINEBREAK% After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, you may remove 1 of your red or orange tokens.

Title.name: Lando’s Millennium Falcon
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%1 escape shuttle may dock with you.%LINEBREAK%While you have an escape shuttle docked, you may spend its shields as if they were on your ship card.%LINEBREAK%While you perform a primary attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

Title.name: IG-2000
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade.

Title.name: Marauder
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a primary %REARARC% attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.%LINEBREAK%Add %GUNNER% slot.

Title.name: Andrasta
Title.ability: Adds %RELOAD%%LINEBREAK%Scum only%LINEBREAK%Add %DEVICE% slot.

Title.name: Slave I
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you reveal a turn (%TURNLEFT% or %TURNRIGHT%) or bank (%BANKLEFT% or %BANKRIGHT%) maneuver you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction.%LINEBREAK%Add %TORPEDO% slot.

Title.name: Mist Hunter
Title.ability: Adds %BARRELROLL%%LINEBREAK%Scum only%LINEBREAK%Add %CANNON% slot.

Title.name: Punishing One
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your %FRONTARC%, roll 1 additional attack die.%LINEBREAK%Remove %CREW% slot. Add %ASTROMECH% slot.

Title.name: Shadow Caster
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is in your %SINGLETURRETARC% and your %FRONTARC%, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

Title.name: Havoc
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%Remove %CREW% slot. Add %SENSOR% and %ASTROMECH% slots.

Title.name: Virago
Title.ability: Adds 1 shield %LINEBREAK% During the End Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform a red %BOOST% action.%LINEBREAK%Add %MODIFICATION% slot.

Title.name: Hound’s Tooth
Title.ability: Scum only%LINEBREAK%1 Z-95-AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

Torpedo.name: Proton Torpedoes
Torpedo.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. Change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Torpedo.name: Ion Torpedoes
Torpedo.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

Torpedo.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
Torpedo.ability: Attack (%LOCK%): Spend 1 %CHARGE%. Change 1 %HIT% result to a %CRIT% result.

Turret.name: Ion Cannon Turret
Turret.ability: Adds %ROTATEARC%%LINEBREAK%Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 %HIT% or %CRIT% result to cause the defender to suffer 1 %HIT% damage. All remaining %HIT%/%CRIT% results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.
